description: - 全局安装 `npm install -g webpack`  略 - 安装到你的项目目录 `npm install --save-dev webpack` -  [Redux教程](https://redux.js.org/introduction/getting-started) -  [NetCore2.1认证](http://jasonwatmore.com/post/2018/06/26/aspnet-core-21-simple-api-for-authentication-registration-and-user-management) -  [React](http://www.runoob.com/react/react-tutorial.html)
